comments_since_last_sample.body: Absolutely shit development. Other developers have no problem. How much freaking power do these hacks need? Yet another hard pass for me.

A lot of these “little quirks” that drive the digital foundry guys nuts don’t even get noticed by the majority of the general gaming public. They look for it so it adds up to why it would bother them. I’m my play through on PS5 I have not noticed many of the hiccups they have pointed out at all.
At least with the Series S, it’s usually impressive, whereas the X and PS5 are always disappointing for what ‘seems’ like so much more powerful consoles.
